decks.notes: This deck focuses on quickly casting spells with cascade to overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures and disruptive spells. The key strategy is to consistently cascade into high-impact cards like Crashing Footfalls and Violent Outburst, utilizing the mechanic to maintain pressure on the opponent while also disrupting their game plan with cards like Force of Negation and Subtlety. The deck aims to control the board and tempo while maintaining a constant threat of aggressive creatures to finish off the opponent quickly.

The deck focuses on quickly reanimating powerful creatures such as Griselbrand and Atraxa, Grand Unifier using cards like Goryo's Vengeance and Fallaji Archaeologist. It also utilizes disruptive elements like Grief and Thoughtseize to control the opponent's hand. Faithful Mending and Tainted Indulgence help to filter through the deck and find the necessary combo pieces. Ephemerate is used to protect key creatures and generate additional value. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats and disruptive plays, while using instant speed reanimation to quickly close out the game.

This deck revolves around using creatures with valuable abilities to create a toolbox of options for different situations. The key strategy involves using sacrifice effects with cards like Blood Artist and Yawgmoth, Thran Physician to generate value and control the board. The deck also utilizes creature tutor effects like Chord of Calling to search for specific creatures when needed. The mana base includes lands to support the different colors needed for the creatures, with some utility lands for added flexibility. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a versatile and resilient creature-based combo strategy.

The deck focuses on control through a combination of removal spells, hand disruption, and powerful threats like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Troll of Khazad-d√ªm. It utilizes cards like Fatal Push, Thoughtseize, and Inquisition of Kozilek to disrupt the opponent's strategy, while also using cards like March of Wretched Sorrow and Sheoldred's Edict to control the board. The deck also includes cards like Karn, the Great Creator and Cabal Coffers for additional resource advantage. The main win condition is to establish board control and overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures and spells.

The deck focuses on playing powerful control cards to dominate the game and disrupt the opponent's strategy. It utilizes a variety of removal spells, counter spells, and card advantage engines to maintain control of the game. The deck also features powerful threats like Omnath, Locus of Creation and Wrenn and Six to pressure the opponent and close out the game. The inclusion of a companion in Kaheera, the Orphanguard adds another angle of attack and synergizes well with the rest of the deck. The mana base is carefully constructed to support the deck's four-color control strategy.

This deck focuses on utilizing the Hardened Scales enchantment to maximize the value of +1/+1 counters on creatures like Zabaz, the Glimmerwasp. By including creatures with modular abilities like Arcbound Ravager and Hangarback Walker, as well as artifacts that can synergize with the strategy like The Ozolith and Walking Ballista, the deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent with a growing army of creatures. Additionally, the inclusion of Urza's Saga and Ancient Stirrings helps to find key pieces of the combo while maintaining a consistent mana base.

This deck revolves around assembling the Heliod Spike combo, using cards like Spike Feeder and Walking Ballista to gain infinite life and kill the opponent. Auriok Champion provides protection and lifegain, while Ranger-Captain of Eos helps tutor combo pieces. Collected Company and Eladamri's Call provide additional consistency in finding combo pieces. The deck also includes ramp and utility lands to help stabilize and protect the combo. Overall, the key strategy is to assemble the combo quickly and efficiently to overwhelm the opponent.

The main concept of this deck is to assemble UrzaTron (Urza's Mine, Power Plant, and Tower) to generate a large amount of mana quickly. With this mana, the deck aims to play powerful colorless threats like Wurmcoil Engine and Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger, while also controlling the board with cards like Oblivion Stone and Relic of Progenitus. Additionally, the deck has access to versatile cards like Karn, the Great Creator and Ugin, the Spirit Dragon to further solidify its control over the game. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats and efficient removal spells.

The main idea of this deck is to control the game by utilizing a variety of powerful spells and creatures. The deck focuses on using cards like Solitude, Subtlety, Omnath, Locus of Creation, and The One Ring to dominate the battlefield. With a mix of counterspells, removal spells, and versatile planeswalkers like Wrenn and Six and Teferi, Time Raveler, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy while establishing its own board presence. Additionally, the addition of Kaheera, the Orphanguard as a companion provides an extra advantage in creature matchups.

The deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly and efficiently to play powerful land-based combos that can rapidly overwhelm the opponent. Using cards like Arboreal Grazer and Dryad of the Ilysian Grove to accelerate land drops, along with Amulet of Vigor to untap lands, the goal is to quickly bring out large threats like Primeval Titan and Cultivator Colossus. The deck also utilizes utility lands like Urza's Saga and Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle to further enhance its abilities and ensure dominance on the battlefield through a combination of speed and strategic land management.

This deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly to cast powerful threats like Primeval Titan and Cultivator Colossus. The key strategy is to use Amulet of Vigor and bounce lands like Simic Growth Chamber to generate extra mana and play multiple lands per turn. The deck also includes The One Ring to give additional abilities to creatures and Expedition Map to tutor for key lands like Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle. Overall, the deck aims to assemble a strong board presence and overwhelm the opponent with big creatures and land synergies.

The deck focuses on quickly casting spells with Cascade mechanics to overwhelm the opponent with a constant stream of threats. By using cards like Shardless Agent, Crashing Footfalls, and Violent Outburst, the deck aims to put pressure on the opponent and control the board with cards like Subtlety and Tishana's Tidebinder. Additionally, the deck includes versatile spells like Force of Negation and Fire / Ice to maintain tempo and disrupt the opponent's game plan. The mana base is built to support the deck's aggressive strategy while also providing some utility lands for specific situations.

This deck focuses on utilizing cascade mechanics to quickly overwhelm opponents with a swarm of powerful creatures and spells. By combining cards with cascade abilities like Shardless Agent and Violent Outburst, the deck is able to consistently put pressure on the opponent and flood the board with threats. Additionally, the deck includes cards like Subtlety and Leyline of the Guildpact to disrupt opposing strategies and protect its own creatures. With a mix of aggressive creatures, efficient spells, and disruptive elements, this deck aims to quickly close out games before the opponent has a chance to stabilize.

This deck focuses on casting powerful spells with Cascade mechanics, allowing you to cheat out big creatures like Scion of Draco and Crashing Footfalls without paying their full mana cost. By combining Aggro strategies with Cascade abilities, you can overwhelm your opponent with fast, impactful plays. Leyline cards help you control the board and protect your key creatures, while Shardless Agent and other cascade spells ensure a steady stream of threats. Overall, this deck aims to quickly build a dominating board presence and close out games before your opponent can fully react.

The deck focuses on utilizing cascade spells such as Violent Outburst to cascade into Living End, a powerful sorcery that can return all creatures from both players' graveyards to the battlefield. By filling the graveyard with creatures like Street Wraith and Grief, the deck can set up a powerful board presence in a single turn, overwhelming the opponent. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Force of Negation to protect the combo. Additionally, cards like Curator of Mysteries and Waker of Waves provide card draw and additional utility to help the deck function smoothly.

The deck focuses on utilizing The Underworld Cookbook to quickly and efficiently fill your graveyard with cards like Seed of Hope and Mishra's Bauble, allowing you to trigger powerful effects like Goryo's Vengeance and Finale of Devastation. Traverse the Ulvenwald helps you find key pieces while Insidious Roots and Ovalchase Daredevil provide additional value. Emrakul, the Aeons Torn and Atraxa, Grand Unifier serve as powerful finishers, while Asmoranomardicadaistinaculdacar and Street Wraith help with card selection. The land base is optimized to support the deck's strategy and give you the best chance of victory.
